description: This is a large handful of dainty whiled flowers harvested from some manner of indigenous vegetation, said to have a slightly refreshing, if bland, flavour profile.  That being said, while edible in their raw state, they are far from the culinary preference of choice for pallets free from the persuasion of necessity.
//: Nutrition and vitamin numbers are based on the information in https://www.nutritionix.com/food/edible-flower
//2: Vitamin C numbers are, as of yet, still provisional, though they are supposedly high.
